content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 5, Sporting de Gijón 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 5, Sporting de Gijón 0.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 5, Sporting de Gijón 0. Fernando Torres (Atlético de Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Lillo (Sporting de Gijón) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty conceded by Lillo (Sporting de Gijón) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Atlético de Madrid. Nicolás Gaitán draws a foul in the penalty area.
Douglas (Sporting de Gijón) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt saved. Ángel Correa (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Filipe Luis.
Foul by Nacho Cases (Sporting de Gijón).
Augusto Fernández (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Borja Viguera (Sporting de Gijón) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nacho Cases with a headed pass.
Corner,  Sporting de Gijón. Conceded by Stefan Savic.
Attempt blocked. Carlos Castro (Sporting de Gijón) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Akram Afif.

Corner,  Sporting de Gijón. Conceded by Diego Godín.

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 4, Sporting de Gijón 0. Fernando Torres (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ángel Correa.
Corner,  Sporting de Gijón. Conceded by Stefan Savic.
